Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members assigned to a team

Name: Sprint Length
Description: Duration of a sprint in days

Name: Budget Allocation
Description: Planned budget for the project in EUR

Name: Story Points per Sprint
Description: Total story points planned each sprint

Name: Testing Hours per Feature
Description: Hours allocated for testing each feature

Name: Releases per Year
Description: Number of major releases scheduled per year

Name: Sprints per Release
Description: Number of sprints included in a release

Name: Features per Release
Description: Count of features to include in a release

Name: Tasks per Sprint
Description: Number of tasks to plan each sprint

Name: Scrum Master Hours
Description: Scrum Master support hours per sprint
